remarks: A set-like well-ordering of the class of ordinal pairs.  Proposition 7.58(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 54.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
leweon.1 $e |- L = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. ( On X. On ) /\ y e. ( On X. On ) ) /\ ( ( 1st ` x ) e. ( 1st ` y ) \/ ( ( 1st ` x ) = ( 1st ` y ) /\ ( 2nd ` x ) e. ( 2nd ` y ) ) ) ) } $.
r0weon.1 $e |- R = { <. z , w >. | ( ( z e. ( On X. On ) /\ w e. ( On X. On ) ) /\ ( ( ( 1st ` z ) u. ( 2nd ` z ) ) e. ( ( 1st ` w ) u. ( 2nd ` w ) ) \/ ( ( ( 1st ` z ) u. ( 2nd ` z ) ) = ( ( 1st ` w ) u. ( 2nd ` w ) ) /\ z L w ) ) ) } $.
r0weon $p |- ( R We ( On X. On ) /\ R Se ( On X. On ) ) $.
$d L w z $.
$d w x y z $.
$d w z $.
